#### About me

I am currently in my sixth year of studying Civil Industrial Engineering at [Universidad de los Andes](https://www.uandes.cl/). I have a deep passion for data analytics, technology, and finance. I thrive on learning about new technologies and enjoy applying my skills to tackle real-world challenges.
